title: How to Make the Right Decision Every Time: 10 Keys for Finding God's Direction
description: Make your choices with faith and confidence We all have to make decisions, big and small, every day.  Sometimes those decisions are life-changing, and we can get paralyzed trying to make them. We wonder “What does God want me to do? How can I know?” This book reveals biblical and practical keys that can help readers get direction, find their purpose, follow God's will, and get it right every time. With biblical wisdom and examples of everyday people, this book will help them: •   Learn the scriptural principles behind being led by God’s plan, and how to employ those principles in their lives •   Learn practical ways to apply God’s principles for making decisions •   Be able to clearly understand the benefits of getting God’s direction for their lives
author: Karen Jensen Salisbury
